snippet: The first President George Bush can look forward to spending the holidays at home after nearly three weeks in the hospital with a bronchitis-related cough.
abstract: First Pres George Bush is steadily improving after nearly three weeks in hospital with bronchitis-related cough; hopes to spend holidays at home.
lead_paragraph: The first President George Bush can look forward to spending the holidays at home after nearly three weeks in the hospital with a bronchitis-related cough.

headline.main: Texas: Elder George Bush Is Likely to Leave Hospital Soon
headline.print_headline: Texas: Elder George Bush Is Likely To Leave Hospital Soon
